Articles.Content:
Everything you need to complete a satellite contract, at a discount price of 21.600 spacebucks.

41 tons and 67 parts.

I spent around 4 hours to finish this rocket. 

![2015-05-01_00002_zps72n7czxm.jpg](http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo19/TimePeriod/Kerbal%20Space%20Program/2015-05-01_00002_zps72n7czxm.jpg)

![2015-05-01_00005_zpsnhcum1fs.jpg](http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo19/TimePeriod/Kerbal%20Space%20Program/2015-05-01_00005_zpsnhcum1fs.jpg)

**High quality images found in my Photobucket - See my signature.**
From your description, I'm guessing this is something that could be used for career mode.

> 
> From your description, I'm guessing this is something that could be used for career mode.

I've always prided myself building rockets using low costs, low tech parts and allowed a good degree of modification.

> 
> I've always prided myself building rockets using low costs, low tech parts and allowed a good degree of modification.

You know, that's quite an achievement to behold ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) +repon you buddy
